name: Don´t Stop (JoxT)
description:
Classic platformer with a twist, you have a bomb strapped to your body that will explode if you stand still, so DON´T STOP... MOVING.

Use: A and D to move left and right, Space or W to jump, collect 3 keys to complete the level.

Created for the Platzi Game Jam 2020

-Designed and developed by JoxT - josuetejeda02@gmail.com.

Free Asset use for this project:

  • Four Seasons Platformer Tileset - RottingPixels
  • 2D Platformer Characters  - RottingPixels
  • Enemy Characters Pack - Enemy Characters Pack

Free Music and SFX:

  • Mario´s Way (level 1) -    xsgianni
  •  Arcade Music (level2) -  joshuaempyre
  • Ice Cavern (level3) -   sirkoto51
  • Pick up Key -  mr-fritz
  • Jumping - leszek-szary

Font joystix monospace.
